topics.body:
Going back to what we were talking about earlier about how Disney and other companies are trying to squeeze the superhero genre for all the money it's worth how much longer do you think the cash cow can continue to last?

I don't think it can last much more milking cause sales wise avengers 2 did *REALLY* well, but the reason why it did so well is that it was shown in drastically more countries and studios.  It sold well, but I think we've already reached the apex of popularity.  My guess is when avengers 3 comes out the sales start going down.  Avengers this year sold more than all of Marvel's other titles combined.
My guess is 2016 "Woohoo more super heroes!"; 2017 "Okay that's enough superheroes guys"; 2018 "Dropped".
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

I predict about two more good years before the fade. The end ofnavengers will mark the end of the superhero craze if you ask me.

Come on DC! TV Ma batman! Do it before the fade!
